title: Foldronic: Refold the Future
subtitle: Ad design and brand identity system for a robotic cloth-folding device
insight: Built awareness and visual identity for a first-of-its-kind smart cloth-folding machine with futuristic branding.
challenge: To build awareness and visual identity for a first-of-its-kind smart cloth-folding machine.
strategy: Developed a cohesive campaign spanning digital, outdoor, and merchandise with strong futuristic branding anchored in the tagline: 'Refold the Future'.
process: Created branding assets including logo, typography, and packaging
Designed 360° campaign assets: POP displays, web, merchandise, radio, and storyboard for TVC
Authored brand manual for unified application

results.description: Complete visual system from logo to packaging
Digital, outdoor, merchandise, and broadcast assets

learnings: Future-oriented design must be both imaginative and user-accessible. Integrating robotics into daily life works best with clarity and minimalism.

title: SUSTANE: Podcast-Centered Sustainability Campaign
subtitle: Building a purpose-driven content strategy for a Gen Z eco-audience
insight: Cultivated a loyal Gen Z eco-audience through satirical animated podcast content and community integration.
challenge: How can a new sustainability-focused brand cultivate a loyal, informed, and engaged Gen Z audience through emotionally resonant media?
strategy: Developed a multi-platform animated podcast campaign—SUSTANEyourself—leveraging satire, cultural influencers, and community integration to spread environmental messaging.
process: Researched Gen Z behavioral trends, podcast discoverability patterns, and sustainability communication best practices
Structured content to blend humor and critique with direct calls to action
Platform targeting included Spotify, YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram

results.description: Robust content strategy with detailed mockups and guest curation
Syndication, brand sponsorship, and community-sourced content

learnings: Satirical, visually engaging formats dramatically improve participation in cause-based media. Thoughtful platform selection and clear brand tone are critical for credibility and traction.

title: InOther News: The Economics of a Sustainable News Brand
subtitle: Developing phased business models for journalistic and entrepreneurial innovation
insight: Built resilient business models for independent digital media through phased monetization strategies.
challenge: Independent digital media brands face shrinking ad revenues and fragmented audiences. How can startups build resilient models for long-term viability?
strategy: Built a phased business model roadmap focusing on three stages: Community Building, Monetization, and Diversification. Each phase had unique KPIs and revenue levers—starting with low-lift engagement channels and evolving into syndication/consulting models.
process: Compared 6 global case studies of successful independent media brands
Developed financial charts and media kit mockups for investor presentations
Created frameworks for subscription tiers, archive monetization, and freelancer networks

results.description: By end of phase 2 through blended monetization strategies
Comprehensive investor pitch with sustainable growth projections

learnings: Sustainable journalism doesn't just rely on storytelling—it's driven by strategic infrastructure and early-stage platform trust. Clear value tiers and content extensions are critical to survival.

title: AI in Programmatic Advertising
subtitle: Investigating automation, ethics, and media control in modern ad systems
insight: Evaluated AI's impact on programmatic advertising, revealing efficiency gains alongside ethical concerns.
researchFocus: This research project evaluates how artificial intelligence is shaping the landscape of programmatic advertising—specifically looking at personalization, budget allocation, and ethical boundaries.
methodology: Qualitative content analysis of advertising whitepapers, case studies from Google Ads and The Trade Desk, and interviews with media practitioners. Used academic frameworks on automation bias and algorithmic opacity.
keyFindings: AI enables efficient spend allocation and audience targeting, but it also reinforces confirmation bias and lacks transparency. Systems often default to engagement-maximizing patterns that may undermine diversity and equity in messaging.
implications: Marketers and policymakers must collaborate to create audit-friendly AI frameworks. Ethical advertising requires human override layers, diversity-informed datasets, and campaign-level fairness metrics.

title: Poppi: Social Media Strategy Campaign
subtitle: Influencer-first, Gen Z-targeted campaign plan for a prebiotic soda brand
insight: Positioned Poppi as the go-to prebiotic soda for Gen Z through lifestyle-focused influencer campaigns.
challenge: Position Poppi as the go-to prebiotic soda for Gen Z by increasing online reach, relatability, and product trial conversion.
strategy: Developed a four-phase social media campaign targeting Instagram, TikTok, and Pinterest with influencer segmentation based on audience tiers. Messaging centered around the 'Poppi Girl Routine' lifestyle aesthetic and health benefits.
process: Outlined content expectations and built influencer briefings for different audience tiers
Built comprehensive hashtag strategies and platform-native content guidelines
Created user-generated challenge campaigns to drive organic engagement

results.description: Projected engagement spikes across Instagram, TikTok, and Pinterest
Increased brand recall through strategic influencer partnerships

learnings: Clear lifestyle messaging, tiered influencer outreach, and continuous content adaptation based on real-time metrics are key to social campaign success.

title: Fresco: Direct Marketing Strategy
subtitle: A ready-to-blend frozen smoothie brand's full-funnel direct marketing plan
insight: Introduced a new FMCG smoothie brand through targeted direct marketing emphasizing convenience and health benefits.
challenge: Introduce a new FMCG smoothie brand in a competitive health-conscious market, while emphasizing ease and convenience.
strategy: Segmented the audience by psychographic and demographic profiles, and mapped out a tailored direct marketing mix using digital and physical media.
process: Developed channel-wise collateral including emailers, WhatsApp pushes, and social media content
Created physical marketing materials like hoardings, leaflets, and point-of-sale displays
Employed the 4Ps of marketing framework to align message delivery with consumer context

results.description: Campaign hashtags like #FrescoTheNewFresh generated significant awareness
Popup presence and testimonials drove organic interest

learnings: Hyperlocal, consistent messaging supported by multichannel assets can differentiate even in a saturated wellness space. Direct marketing thrives on clarity and sensory storytelling.

title: Levi's: Building Brand Loyalty Through Social Content
subtitle: Reimagining Levi's online presence with personas, platforms, and purpose
insight: Increased Levi's online engagement through persona-driven content strategy and strategic influencer partnerships.
challenge: Levi's sought to increase online engagement and brand affinity among younger audiences, especially in a competitive fashion space where ethical sourcing and cultural relevance are key.
strategy: Created three detailed buyer personas to guide tone and platform targeting, from nostalgia-loving millennials to sustainability-conscious Gen Zs. Developed a full-funnel content plan focused on storytelling, lifestyle integration, and strategic partnerships.
process: Built comprehensive buyer personas based on demographic and psychographic research
Created platform-specific content calendars with tailored formats for each social channel
Developed content pillars including brand collaborations, sustainability messaging, and artist partnerships

results.description: Unified brand narrative blending storytelling with commerce
Targeted messaging aligned with each audience segment's values

learnings: Brand loyalty online isn't built through volume, but through value—persona-led narratives, platform fluency, and authenticity in every post create lasting connections.

title: Marvel Studios: Future-Proofing the MCU
subtitle: A boardroom pitch to recalibrate Marvel's universe through intimacy, depth, and cultural timing
insight: Proposed strategic content slowdown and narrative reset to combat MCU franchise fatigue through character-focused storytelling.
challenge: Marvel faced franchise fatigue post-Endgame, with declining fan engagement, weaker box office results, internal controversies and criticism around content volume and quality.
strategy: Proposed a phased content slowdown and narrative reset grounded in cultural analysis, fan expectations, and competitor trajectories. Suggested focusing on ensemble intimacy over spectacle and character transformation over universe expansion.
process: Conducted comprehensive brand diagnosis across MCU Phases 1-4
Analyzed cultural symbols, box office returns, trailer sentiments, and platform-specific feedback
Benchmarked against DC and indie studios to identify strategic opportunities

results.description: Strategic budget realignment to focus on character-driven narratives
Future-facing playbook for franchise reinvigoration

learnings: The MCU doesn't need to scale bigger—it needs to scale deeper. When storytelling honors character complexity and emotional pacing, universes grow not outward, but inward.

title: AI's Impact on Social Media and Influencers
subtitle: Analyzing the intersection of artificial intelligence and influencer culture
insight: Explored how AI technologies are reshaping influencer dynamics, audience engagement, and authenticity on social platforms.
researchFocus: Understanding how AI technologies like recommendation engines, generative tools, and chatbots are reshaping influencer dynamics, audience engagement, and authenticity on social platforms.
methodology: Case study analysis and literature review of platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube, along with emerging AI tools and their impact on content creation and audience behavior.
keyFindings: AI-generated content is blurring the line between creators and algorithms. Influencer engagement is now driven more by machine-learning insights than human intuition. Trust and transparency remain key challenges as synthetic media becomes more prevalent.
implications: Brands and influencers must adapt to a world where AI shapes reach, creativity, and audience behavior. There is a growing need for ethical guidelines and transparency in AI-assisted influencer marketing.

title: Veganism Trends in India
subtitle: A Study on the Rise of Vegan Products and Public Perception
insight: Analyzed growing vegan awareness in India, identifying opportunities and barriers in the plant-based market.
researchFocus: To analyze the awareness, lifestyle impact, and public perception of vegan products in India, with a focus on soy-based alternatives and consumer adoption patterns.
methodology: A literature review was conducted alongside the development and distribution of a structured questionnaire. Primary data was gathered from a sample of urban consumers using non-probability sampling techniques.
keyFindings: A growing awareness of vegan diets is evident among young Indian consumers, with soy emerging as a preferred substitute. However, challenges around accessibility, affordability, and cultural food preferences still act as barriers to widespread adoption.
implications: Brands should promote educational content and accessible product lines tailored to the Indian market. There's significant opportunity for plant-based innovation and partnerships with local health influencers.

title: Authenticity in Short-Form Influencer Content
subtitle: Exploring Its Influence on Purchasing Decisions
insight: Examined how perceived authenticity in influencer content impacts consumer engagement and purchasing decisions across platforms.
researchFocus: To examine whether perceived authenticity in short-form influencer videos has a stronger impact on consumer engagement and purchasing decisions compared to traditional brand advertisements.
methodology: Mixed-method research using surveys and data visualizations. Key metrics evaluated included engagement behavior, purchase frequency, and trust perception across demographic and psychographic segments.
keyFindings: 84.2% of respondents cited personal storytelling as the most influential authenticity factor. Frequent promotions reduce trust, while demonstrations and honest reviews significantly increased purchase confidence. Platform-specific behaviors showed TikTok triggering impulse purchases while YouTube supported research-based decisions.
implications: Brands should prioritize authentic influencer partnerships using storytelling and transparency. Content strategies must adapt to platform-specific behaviors, with clicks and saves being more indicative of purchase intent than likes or comments.

title: A Study on the Impact of Music Streaming Apps on Radio
subtitle: An Analytical Study of Millennial Media Preferences in India
insight: Analyzed the shift from traditional radio to music streaming among young Indians, revealing changing consumption patterns.
researchFocus: To analyze the impact of music streaming applications on traditional radio consumption among 16–24-year-olds in India, examining preference shifts and behavioral changes.
methodology: Mixed-method approach using cross-sectional surveys with a 5-point Likert Scale to derive quantitative data and analyze qualitative responses among young adults aged 16–24 across urban areas.
keyFindings: 75% of respondents use music streaming apps daily, while only 24% listen to radio regularly. Lack of personalization and excessive advertisements make radio less appealing to youth. Streaming platforms support independent artists and regional content, attracting younger and diverse audiences.
implications: Radio broadcasters must innovate by incorporating on-demand and personalized content features. Advertising strategies need to shift towards platforms with accurate user analytics and targeted reach capabilities.

title: Naturals Ice Cream: Digital Presence Audit
subtitle: Brand audit and strategy evaluation of India's beloved ice cream chain
insight: Evaluated Naturals Ice Cream's digital brand presence and identified optimization opportunities for enhanced engagement.
challenge: Evaluate Naturals Ice Cream's online brand engagement and identify optimization opportunities to improve digital presence and customer interaction.
strategy: Comprehensive audit of existing presence across platforms, buyer persona mapping, and keyword SEO analysis to identify gaps and opportunities for improvement.
process: Reviewed posting frequency, tone, and engagement rates across Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook
Analyzed two core buyer personas to understand behavior patterns and key touchpoints
Benchmarked SEO visibility using keyword targeting analysis and backlink evaluation

results.description: Low engagement and content gaps across social platforms
Improved posting cadence, visual content, and influencer partnerships

learnings: Consistency, SEO-backed content, and responsive online reputation management are vital to thriving in the competitive food and lifestyle FMCG space.

title: Media Ethics: TikTok & Propaganda
subtitle: Exploring misinformation, censorship, and ethical dilemmas on social media
insight: Investigated TikTok's ethical landscape, examining propaganda, misinformation, and the platform's impact on media integrity.
researchFocus: To investigate the ethical landscape of TikTok with a focus on propaganda, misinformation, privacy concerns, and the role of government regulation in social media governance.
methodology: Case-based analysis using real-world incidents, content moderation reviews, and ethical theory applications including Utilitarianism to evaluate platform decision-making and policy implications.
keyFindings: TikTok is vulnerable to both state-driven and user-generated propaganda. Privacy breaches and content censorship present serious ethical dilemmas. Fact-checking partnerships and content transparency are essential to platform integrity.
implications: Social media platforms must invest in ethical AI systems, transparent policies, and international moderation standards. There's a critical need for regulatory frameworks that balance free expression with harm prevention.

title: Echoes of the City
subtitle: A quiet storm of ambition, love, and loss in the city that never sleeps
insight: A raw, character-driven drama exploring the human condition in urban environments through interconnected storylines.
synopsis: Three strangers. One city. A series of quiet collisions that unravel the layers of ambition, identity, and belonging in New York. 'Echoes of the City' is a raw, character-driven drama where an actress, a banker, and an artist confront the personal and societal forces shaping their lives.
role: Writer & Concept Creator - Developed the original concept, wrote the screenplay, and created the narrative framework for character development and thematic exploration.
designRationale: Draws inspiration from ensemble dramas like 'Crash' and 'Birdman', capturing the emotional undercurrent of urban life. Each character arc reflects a different face of the modern metropolis—ambition, disillusionment, cultural erosion. The goal: create empathy through realism, and urgency through stillness.

title: Mythos Beyond Time
subtitle: What if you could reshape destiny — not just watch it unfold?
insight: An immersive interactive narrative that bridges ancient mythology with modern storytelling through audience participation.
synopsis: An artist's brush awakens gods. A shattered amulet holds the fate of realms. In this immersive interactive tale, your choices guide Nadia Rao as she battles chaos, forms divine alliances, and rewrites ancient myth in a modern world. Every decision counts. Every myth returns.
role: Creator, Scriptwriter & Worldbuilder - Designed the interactive narrative system, created the mythological framework, and developed the branching storyline structure.
designRationale: Inspired by Indian epics and the branching storytelling of 'Bandersnatch' and 'Percy Jackson', this project bridges lore with interactivity. Centers mythology as a universal, connective force in a fractured world. Built for transmedia expansion with audience-directed storytelling.

title: Narratives Unbound
subtitle: A visual dashboard comparing books with their movie adaptations
insight: Created an interactive exploration of story adaptation, allowing users to compare books with their cinematic interpretations.
challenge: How do cinematic adaptations compare with the books that inspired them—and what does 'fidelity' really mean to audiences?
strategy: Created an interactive dashboard that invites users to flip through adaptations, explore ratings, and reflect on story transformation across media formats.
process: Built flip-card interface linking book covers to movie posters for intuitive comparison
Integrated custom fidelity scores and platform availability data
Enabled both grid and scatter-style navigation modes for different user preferences

results.description: Engaging platform that gamifies media comparison and analysis
Personal, playful approach to understanding adaptation fidelity

learnings: Narratives are not static. Giving users control to compare, explore, and interpret makes media analysis personal, playful, and powerful.

title: The Brand Project: A Visual Identity Journey
subtitle: Tracing the evolution of logos, language, and meaning
insight: Interactive exploration of brand evolution, showing how visual identity reflects strategic intent across time.
challenge: How does brand identity evolve over time—and how do color, form, and voice reflect strategic intent and market positioning?
strategy: Built an interactive journey that visually deconstructs a brand's logo, palette, typography, and tone across different phases of development.
process: Used timeline structure to show shifts in brand positioning and visual language
Embedded contextual notes on messaging evolution, audience changes, and medium adaptation
Mapped design choices back to key business milestones and market conditions

results.description: Complete visual journey through brand evolution and strategic development
Users can walk through evolution rather than just read about it

learnings: A brand isn't just what it looks like—it's how it adapts visually and verbally to the world around it. Design is language in motion.

title: FLARE: Ad Fatigue Detection Engine
subtitle: A prototype dashboard to decode digital ad fatigue and optimize campaigns
insight: Developed a predictive dashboard to help advertisers detect and prevent ad fatigue before performance decline.
challenge: How can advertisers detect when their campaigns are wearing thin—and act before performance plummets and audience trust erodes?
strategy: Designed a dashboard using a custom Fatigue Risk Index (FRI) to track signs of ad fatigue and suggest timely interventions for campaign optimization.
process: Classified fatigue in three stages: Friction, Fatigue, and Failure with specific indicators
Implemented dynamic charts using Plotly and Streamlit for real-time visualization
Generated personalized recommendations and calculated waste spend estimates

results.description: Early warning system for campaign performance decline
Helps advertisers make timely, audience-respecting decisions

learnings: Performance data tells a story—if you know how to listen. Strategic pauses and creative shifts are as powerful as launch-day tactics.

title: Vouch: Nightlife Reimagined
subtitle: A minimalist, crowd-powered nightlife discovery tool built for real people—not algorithms
insight: Designed a human-first nightlife discovery platform that prioritizes authentic recommendations over algorithmic suggestions.
challenge: How can we create a nightlife planning app that feels personal, spontaneous, and safe—without the clutter of social media or algorithmic noise?
strategy: Designed a no-signup, crowd-sourced recommendation platform prioritizing real-time feedback and user trust over influencer culture or advertising revenue.
process: Developed detailed personas and mapped psychographics of Gen Z and urban millennial users
Created competitive positioning maps against Yelp, TPSI, BarGlance, and other discovery platforms
Designed accessible, mobile-first UX with map-based and vibe-based filtering systems

results.description: Complete branding system and user interface design
Alternative to algorithm-driven event discovery platforms

learnings: Designing for trust and spontaneity means stripping away friction—not just adding features. Community insights outperform algorithmic curation for authentic experiences.

title: Verizon Logo: Bridging Legacy and Future
subtitle: Exploring bold, modern logo systems rooted in brand heritage and digital clarity
insight: Explored three distinct logo pathways for Verizon, balancing recognizable legacy elements with fresh, user-centric design.
synopsis: This identity design explores three distinct logo pathways for Verizon—each balancing its recognizable legacy symbols with a fresher, more user-centric style that reflects evolving customer expectations.
role: Brand Designer - Conceptualized and designed multiple logo variations, conducted competitive analysis, and developed brand system guidelines.
designRationale: Introduced modular systems featuring the classic checkmark and extended 'Z' elements. Aligned visual tone with evolving customer perception and mobile-first touchpoints. Benchmarked against major telecom and media brands to achieve optimal balance of modernity and memorability.

title: Book Cover Exploration
subtitle: A visual reinterpretation inspired by editorial collage and textured minimalism
insight: Reimagined classic literary work through contemporary design principles, layered illustration, and experimental typography.
synopsis: A cover redesign project that reimagines a classic literary work through layered illustration, expressive color palettes, and mixed-type aesthetics that bridge traditional and contemporary design sensibilities.
role: Cover Designer - Developed concept, created illustrations, and designed typography system for book cover redesign project.
designRationale: Utilized #6f8490, #0f2d30, and #702a2a color palette to evoke specific mood and emotional resonance. Combined serif and sans-serif fonts to create visual hierarchy and modern contrast. Used collage and cut-out inspired artwork to build symbolic visual metaphors.
